} else {

}

item.title: Give item and delte item command problem ! < ----- HELP plz :D
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

oke
my problemm is i want all skills do work and make money with … so i did that and i have a problem with fletshing
the xp works all wel etc… buttt i could make a shop where peaple can sell their addy arrows for some cash but that is loooooots of clicking so i thought hmm why i dont make
a command that change 1000 addy arrows for 75 mil… i knew how to make it but i had some problems…

this is the code ive made :

if(command.startsWith(“addyarrows”)){
deleteItem(890, 1000);
addItem(995, 75000000);
} else {
deleteItem(995, 75000000);
sM("@red@U need 1000 addy arrows for doing this Command!");
}

and i have 2 problems the first one is if u dont got addy arrows on u and you do this command it still gives 75 mil…
and the other problem is with my text after every single command i do or somebody else the shows up that text :S i dont know what ive wrong
i just started coding… :S i know the problem of that arows but not how to fix it and that message is just weird for me :S
plzz help me :rolleyes:

[sup]if(command.startsWith(“addyarrows”)){
deleteItem(890, 1000);
addItem(995, 75000000);
} else {
deleteItem(995, 75000000);
sM("@red@U need 1000 addy arrows for doing this Command!");
}[/sup]
